question: Which country was ranked first on breastfeeding rate according to a new survey conducted by the World Breastfeeding Trends Initiative (WBTi)?
explanation:
Sri Lanka has been ranked first among 97 countries on breastfeeding rate as per the new survey conducted by the World Breastfeeding Trends Initiative (WBTi). 
The World Breastfeeding Trends Initiative (WBTi) was launched by the experts at the Breastfeeding Promotion Network of India, based at Delhi. 120 countries across the world have been involved in WBTi, as of now. The report stated that Sri Lanka had shown greater commitment health and nutrition of mothers and babies. The country has scored 91 out of 100 points, based on its performance on ten indicators of policies and programs.
